title: RBI MPC proposes steps to speed up clearance of cheques to a few hours
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI)-led Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) proposed several measures to speed up clearance of cheques to a few hours, said governor Shaktikanta Das, while announcing the results of the bi-monthly policy meet.
